item.title: 📰 [AWS] Accelerate serverless testing with LocalStack integration in VS Code IDE
item.description:
概要

AWS is announcing integrated LocalStack support in the AWS Toolkit for Visual Studio Code that makes it easier than ever for developers to test and debug serverless applications locally. This enhancement builds upon our recent improvements to the Lambda development experience, including the console …
